column1: This file will be used to upload data to the NelsonDB. FIELD NAMES CAN BE ADDED, BUT SHOULD BE DONE SPARINGLY

column4: A unique ID for the row planted in the format 08PN0023. MUST BE UNIQUE
The experiment's name that this row is a part of.
The seed ID for the seed that was planted in the row. The Seed ID is a unique ID in the format 08PN0023_001x. This is the ID that is printed on seed packets.
The pedigree of the seed that was planted. E.G. B73
The field name in which the row was planted. Field names are unique. Example: Aurora NY
A human readable name for the row.
The number for the range in which the row was grown.
The name of the plot in which the row was grown.
The name of the block in which the row was grown.
The rep that this row was a part of.
The number of kernels that were planted in the row.
The date that the row wwas planted. Format: 2015-01-30
The date that the row was harvested. Format: 2015-01-30
Any additioal comments for the row.
